p: The Essential Oil of Ziziphora Clinopodioides (EOZC) contains a diversity of biologically active compounds like monoterpenes and sesquiterpenes ( Shahbazi, 2015). Most studies on rats and or mice with experimental models of pain have demonstrated that some of these terpenes have analgesic effects ( Almeida, Navarro, & Barbosa-Filho, 2001). Therefore, the current study aimed to determine the antinociceptive effect of EOZC on opioidergic system in male rats.
